item.title: What annoys u most about people on rs?
item.dc:creator: @Telenim Telenim
item.description:
@Telenim wrote:

Yeah I see a few acting like a total moron, saying fake stuff, etc. trying to get new items/lost items back

“omfggggg i was fiteing kbd i wnt to get a drink i come back and i was already pked by a level 122 ranger!!! fix it u noobs!!!”

“wtf i lagged and i died can i have my godswords and phat back”

“ffs thsi stupid kid went up and said dm i said nty not fiteing ppl just serchin, so i went and attked this guy fr his items and it said i died i lost like bloody santa hats mask hats pee hats 200 m he glitch me fix it i want my items back to or ur sewd”, the rants section, future updates, etc. are all filled up with crap like that, it is kind of pathetic really, at least we don’t have people here like that…

“OMFG ON 2SPEc’d I FUKKEN LOST FULL BGS AND BGS LIKE WTF THIS NOBHED PKED MY FULL BGS BANDOS
AGS ARMADYL AGS FULL LIKE OMFG FIX IT U IDIOT I WANT MOD OR FUCKEN ITEMS OR U FUCKEN SEWD AND REPORTAD TO JAGAX”

Read full topic
item.source: What annoys u most about people on rs?

item.title: What annoys u most about people on rs?
item.dc:creator: @Telenim Telenim
item.description:
@Telenim wrote:

You overdid what the morons say.

1. roflcopter nub stop safing or i safe ~ When you eat at 25HP, and they eat at 32.
2. lolcopterz nub id own u, kk add my main logged ~ Yes I meant to leave out the mains username, because they don’t have a main.
3. ffs press 111 to b my gf im rich, 112!, 112!, 111, stfu nooblet hed stop dating on internet ur pathetic
4. dm lolz nooob id own u 10 seconds later Food? 26 ffs noob hacker teleports
5. sup, i just traded d long in for the grand exchanges santa and mask set prize, it was the last one
6. loooool owned rofl!!! lol!!! ~ 80% are like this [quote=“RuneHQ”]80% GUARANTEED![/quote]

Read full topic

item.title: What annoys u most about people on rs?
item.dc:creator: @noobie22 Noobie22
item.description:
@noobie22 wrote:

Or, How about those kids that are eating at like 38, and you’re eating at 26 and they call you a safer? I lol at them so hard.

Or how about those kids that you fight on a pure: GTFO B4 I GET ON MANE AND PWN U!!

And in like 2007: Hit 449 to be my GF!!! then the kids are like “448” then like right after: HAHAHAHAHAHAHA
Then I’m just standing there like “449 449” and the kids like “SRY I DON’T E-DATE PL0X”

Then there’s the no-armor f2p range/2hers. They’re like “omfg dm dm dm!” and you agree and when they’re out they’re like “food?” I usually reply “15” so they’ll run lololol.

Another thing that annoys me is the kids that are like “OMFG I TREDED V LONG ON MAH MAIN FOR 324 PHAT SETS?!>!?” they just make up ridiculous things that annoy me.

Then there’s the D claw pjers that are like “OMG PWNED!!” And I’m like "No, pjing isn’t ‘pwning’.

Hope you had a fun time reading that.

Read full topic
item.source: What annoys u most about people on rs?

item.title: What annoys u most about people on rs?
item.dc:creator: @Telenim Telenim
item.description:
@Telenim wrote:

I have just a mainly trained level 96 account, 84 strength and 76 attack, a level 97 with 99 HP and ranged wanted to DM me, I said no he started to attack, then we both agreed to a DM, and he ended up teleporting, that is really annoying, it happens a lot.

Also the other day on my level 49 melee pure, I was followed by a level 43 that showed me 200K (not exactly, but something like that), he had no equipment and he wanted to DM me at level 40 wild, when he got to low HP probably around 10-20, he said “hahaha noooob have fun walkin back i took teles!! lol!!!”, and then he started telling me to stop attacking (“plzzz stop i giv u haf of it” to be exact), not an everyday thing but it does happen sometimes.

Rangers at the Bounty Hunter worlds asking to 1v1 in level 30 wild so no teleporting, and ends up being a 4 man team that you own, and they start spamming PMs/clan chat/before they die, or any other way to get a message to you “reported hacker!!!” or “noob u suck!!l!!!”

Fishing at the Fishing Guild, level three botters fishing sharks, you say something towards them like “Lol, bot?” they say “stfu noob get a life” you just say “Lol”, they just go crazy, it’s kind of funny but it really is annoying “omfg stfu u maggot u suck”, “stfu noob im higher fisher then u”, “lol!!! lol!!! u suck!!! owned!!!”, “roflcopterz rofl rofl u suck noob get alife owned!!!” (then logs out).

Choppin’ magic logs at Camelot behind the Rangers Guild, people trying to act cool and everything, “sup i got 10 logs in 2 seconds wot u got? like 1?”, “roflz im pro i just pked 300m in items!”, “dude id so pwn u in cod or gtfo my tree nub” (what the fuck does CoD have to do with RuneScape?), other random stuff like that, even the wannabe mods, “go away this my tree!”, “noob reported 4 bug abuse an item scamming”, or when there is a Jagex Moderator around (true story) I seen this at Varrock, Mod MMG(?) was walking past this guy come up and said “Lol ignore those kiddies they just want mod, wuu2? - sec got like 50 ppl pming me”, “can u gimmeh some st00f il give 2 new ppl for u, just gave away my last 50mil”

Level 3’s that obviously have a main saying “rofl noob id own u, fite?”, when you get to wild they say “kk brb gettin on lvl 140 main”, I just sat there after 5 minutes he logged back on, that happens to me like every day and it is annoying.

Read full topic
item.source: What annoys u most about people on rs?

item.title: What annoys u most about people on rs?
item.dc:creator: @P_I_M_P_3_D_Tut `Lewk_
item.description:
@P_I_M_P_3_D_Tut wrote:

runefreak10:

Also, when you are fishing or something, and some guy in full mithril with a tyras helm and a mithril axe comes up to you, follows you, and says “can i hav ur fish pls”, you then follow up by saying “No.” and they follow up by saying “noob” and they walk away. This happened once to me. I go “Fool.” he goes “ur a mean ****” I go “Ass monkey.” then he picks up my fish I was dropping and I say to him, “Why are you in a members world anyways? I pay to get away from big dumb idiots like you. What the hell do you do anyways? You’re level 58 wearing full mithril with a tyras helm and you’re probably thinking you look pretty cool in it. Stop wasting your money and my time.”

I lol’d.

Read full topic
item.source: What annoys u most about people on rs?

item.title: What annoys u most about people on rs?
item.dc:creator: @runefreak10 runefreak10
item.description:
@runefreak10 wrote:

xx qwertyuiop xx:

Non-members are generally really fucking annoying.

This is 100% true ^

`Rich:

I hate people who complain about updates.

This ^

[quote=“Telenim, post:13, topic:289874”]im trynu be mod take it plz i dnt wnt 2 fite stop it noob omfg get a life u maggot wow i just lost full mith pls gif me item

hi were are we? varrock sq can u take me to varrock fountain?

go away plz il pk u if u don leave noobhead its my zammy wine get lost come here and 1v1 me noooob! 1v1 me u scard nub face i own u hard u stupid nabhead!

press 2 if u want be my gf plzz Buying 2 shrimp rlly? i be ur bf can u gif me rune [/quote]

This ^

Telenim:

I still hate it when people 80+ levels lower call you a noob.

This ^

Jc22493:

Whenever members make fun of non-members, I tell them it’s just a game and they’re so addicted to the game, they are willing to pay $7.50 a month for an imaginary concept, and they shut up.

This made me laugh ^

Jc22493:

Especially F2P PKers that suck ass. They call you ‘safer’ when they are safing more. They say ‘DM’ and I agree, then they run, etc.

And completely this ^

Also, when you are fishing or something, and some guy in full mithril with a tyras helm and a mithril axe comes up to you, follows you, and says “can i hav ur fish pls”, you then follow up by saying “No.” and they follow up by saying “noob” and they walk away. This happened once to me. I go “Fool.” he goes “ur a mean ****” I go “Ass monkey.” then he picks up my fish I was dropping and I say to him, “Why are you in a members world anyways? I pay to get away from big dumb idiots like you. What the hell do you do anyways? You’re level 58 wearing full mithril with a tyras helm and you’re probably thinking you look pretty cool in it. Stop wasting your money and my time.”

And that’s just one story.

Read full topic

Non-members are generally really fucking annoying.

I’m a non-member at the moment.

NOOB ALERT

Nah, I was just kidding, but I find that when I’m on non-member servers I tend to run into really obnoxious people.

Especially F2P PKers that suck ass. They call you ‘safer’ when they are safing more. They say ‘DM’ and I agree, then they run, etc.[/quote]

item.title: What annoys u most about people on rs?
item.dc:creator: @lothy Lothy
item.description:
@lothy wrote:

[quote=“sh1ft, post:16, topic:289874”]wen ppl copy famous players names

ex:
I Pk Mods I ppl do I Pvp Mods I[/quote]
How is I Pk Mods I famous? I had him as my target once on my ranger on a BH world, although I was alching at the time collecting EP so I banked and let him kill me instead of actually fighting him.
Would have been a good fight though, so maybe I should have taken the time out for it.

That aside, 99 strength pures are all over the place these days and aren’t a big deal. They become less dangerous as they raise their attack level IMO.
